mapper.sql: id AS "id", process_number AS "processNumber", operator AS "operator", material_id AS "materialId", m_number AS "mNumber", return_reason AS "returnReason", data_time AS "dataTime", data_state AS "dataState",approvedby AS "approvedBy"
mapper.select:
select
from wms_return_apply where 1 = 1
and process_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.processNumber},'%')

select
from wms_return_apply where 1 = 1
and process_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.processNumber},'%')

SELECT wms_return_apply.id AS "id", wms_return_apply.process_number AS "processNumber", wms_return_apply.operator AS "operator", wms_return_apply.approvedby AS "approvedBy", wms_return_apply.material_id AS "materialId", wms_return_apply.m_number AS "mNumber", wms_return_apply.return_reason AS "returnReason", wms_return_apply.data_time AS "dataTime", wms_return_apply.data_state AS "dataState", wms_material_type.material_type AS "materialType", wms_material_type.material_name AS "materialName", wms_material_type.material_sku AS "materialSku", wms_material_type.plant AS "plant", wms_material_type.di_batchNo AS "diBatchNo", wms_user.user_name as "userName", wms_user.work_team as "workTeam", wms_material_type.sizes as "sizes", wms_user.objectstatus as "objectstatus" FROM wms_return_apply LEFT JOIN wms_material_type on wms_return_apply.material_id=wms_material_type.id LEFT JOIN wms_user on wms_user.serial_number=wms_return_apply.operator where 1=1
and wms_return_apply.process_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.processNumber},'%')
and wms_return_apply.operator like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.operator},'%')
and wms_material_type.material_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialType},'%')
and wms_material_type.material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and wms_material_type.material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and wms_return_apply.data_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.dataState},'%')
and wms_material_type.plant like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.plant},'%')
and wms_material_type.di_batchNo like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.diBatchNo},'%')
and wms_user.user_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.userName},'%')
and wms_user.work_team like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.workTeam},'%')
and wms_material_type.sizes like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sizes},'%')
and wms_user.objectstatus like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.objectstatus},'%')

select
from wms_return_apply where 1 = 1
and process_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.processNumber},'%')
